subject: Luge Racing
Olympic Games (2010)
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The international luge federation reiterated its finding that the death of Nodar Kumaritashvili in Vancouver was not caused by a flaw in the track.
snippet: The international luge federation reiterated its finding that the death of Nodar Kumaritashvili in Vancouver was not caused by a flaw in the track.
